# Docker Hytale Server Container

Repository: https://github.com/deinfreu/hytale-server-container
Documentation: https://hytale-server-container.com
Docker Hub: https://hub.docker.com/r/deinfreu/hytale-server
License: Apache-2.0

## Description
Containerized solution for running Hytale dedicated game servers.
Provides automated server binary management, persistent storage support, and configurable runtime modes for development and production environments.

## Core Capabilities
- Automated Hytale server binary download and updates
- Fast startup with optional caching
- Configurable production and debug modes
- Persistent storage for server data and worlds
- Optimized container images (Alpine and Ubuntu)
- Cross-platform Docker support (x86_64, ARM64 planned)

## Configuration
Server behavior is controlled via environment variables, including:
- Network binding and port configuration
- Production and debug mode toggles
- Startup caching
- Timezone configuration

## Storage
- Persistent storage is supported via Docker volumes or bind mounts
- Server binaries, world data, and configuration files are stored outside the container filesystem

## Authentication
Hytale account authentication is required during initial server setup and startup via a web-based flow.

## Documentation & Guides
Comprehensive documentation is available, including:
- General setup and requirements
- Platform-specific deployment guides (TrueNAS Scale, Unraid, Windows WSL2)
- Server authentication and runtime behavior
- Troubleshooting and FAQs
- Technical details related to Docker, security, and Hytale server operation

## Use Cases
- Self-hosting Hytale dedicated servers
- Mod development and testing
- Persistent multiplayer worlds
- Development and production server deployments
